41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "For whomever Allah wants good, he gives him understanding in the religion

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ إِذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِعَبْدٍ خَيْرًا فَقَّهَهُ فِي الدِّينِ
chapter.eng-name: When Allah Wants Good For A Slave, He Gives Him Understanding In The Religion
